channel.title: Owner/Admin on hyperion?
channel.description:
How do you make your self admin on Hyperion? (Gold crown) also set rights on the commands (so players cant spawn). Base: Hyperion Source: PJA Source (Project 459)
Please answer, thanks.

item.title: Owner/Admin on hyperion?
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

well that depends, hyperion handles rights different than must sources. You may have to decompile the character files and add it there, or there may be a .cfg file added in the data folder. If you cant find anything it may not have been added yet. In which that case you may be able to find a tutorial.

Read full topic
